name: Trio
overview: Published in Magic Disk 64 1989/08. TRIO is a game where the focus is on the fight against the round ball. The main aim of this game is to use a stick to hold a ball within a playing field until a time limit has expired. During one of a total of four levels, as many points as possible must be scored, which can be achieved as follows: If the ball touches one of the three animated points in the middle of the playing field, you get the number of points that appears at the top of the respective display. If there are three symbols of the same type, there is a mega bonus of three times the specified number of points. With three jokers, the player is even credited 1000 bonus points. ATTENTION! Only three clubs are available to the player for each level; Clubs are lost if the ball disappears or if an object is touched!
